channel.title: Small Findings
channel.description: A roundup of small bits of information that I've collected, processed, and put away each week. Findings topics are often mundane (like pizza dough) or weird (like shark attacks in 1916).
channel.author: Jim
channel.itunes:author: Jim
channel.itunes:summary: A roundup of small bits of information that I've collected, processed, and put away each week. Findings topics are often mundane (like pizza dough) or weird (like shark attacks in 1916).

item.title: Episode 1: What is Small Findings? Also painting darkness, mice handedness, and stimulus
item.description:
Findings this week are Woodrow Wilson being weak on sharks, Painting lots of darkness, <script> tags as elements, Hot water gaskets, mouse handedness, lap desks, pizza dough, pizza sausage, and the coronavirus stimulus package.

Email me any findings your want to share (or questions) at smallfindings@fastmail.com !

Here's the executive raise limit formula for companies that take stimulus assistance: (current pay - $3 million)/2 + $3 million 

(The / means "divided by" there.)

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/smallfindings/message
item.dc:creator: Jim
